text: I have Legacy applications uh which are
written on the main frame for for 30
years back the challenge that we were
targeted to solve is basically how do we
improve the digital experiences response
times and reduce the operations cost
that happens on the main frame if we can

operations it process the huge amount of

whatever the data it is manufacturing or
Pro creating or changing in the main

and provide a faster response times

we replicate the data into Cloud
